snippet: Over the next week and a half, musicians will take part in Jazzrael, a festival of jazz and world music presented by the Israeli Consulate in New York.
abstract: Nate Chinen comments that Jazzrael, a upcoming festival of jazz and world music presented by the Israeli Consulate in New York City, highlights how much Israel has influenced the global jazz scene over the past 15 years.
lead_paragraph: Over the next week and a half, musicians will take part in Jazzrael, a festival of jazz and world music presented by the Israeli Consulate in New York.

headline.main: From Israel, a United Nations of Jazz
headline.print_headline: From Israel, a United Nations of Jazz
